schema.title: ui5.yaml
schema.description: Schema for UI5 Tooling Configuration File (ui5.yaml)

specVersion.errorMessage:
Unsupported "specVersion"
Your UI5 CLI installation might be outdated.
Supported specification versions: "3.1", "3.0", "2.6", "2.5", "2.4", "2.3", "2.2", "2.1", "2.0", "1.1", "1.0", "0.1"
For details, see: https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/pages/Configuration/#specification-versions

name.title: Project Name
name.description: Unique identifier for the project, for example: organization.product.project
name.errorMessage: Not a valid project name. It must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, and period only. Additionally, it may contain an npm-style package scope. For details, see: https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/stable/pages/Configuration/#name

resources-configuration-propertiesFileSo.title: Encoding of *.properties files
resources-configuration-propertiesFileSo.description: By default, the UI5 Tooling expects *.properties files to be UTF-8 encoded.

version.title: Version
version.description: Framework version to use in this project
version.errorMessage: Not a valid version according to the Semantic Versioning specification (https://semver.org/)

then.errorMessage: Either "development" or "optional" can be true, but not both

name.title: Extension Name
name.description: Unique identifier for the extension, for example: ui5-task-fearless-rock
name.errorMessage: Not a valid extension name. It must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, and period only. Additionally, it may contain an npm-style package scope. For details, see: https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/stable/pages/Configuration/#name

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on pattern keyword
tests.python_error:
'my ui5 app' does not match '^(?:@[0-9a-z-_.]+\\/)?[a-z][0-9a-z-_.]*$'

Failed validating 'pattern' in schema['then']['then']['else']['then']['then']['properties']['metadata']['properties']['name']:
    {'type': 'string',
     'minLength': 3,
     'maxLength': 80,
     'pattern': '^(?:@[0-9a-z-_.]+\\/)?[a-z][0-9a-z-_.]*$',
     'title': 'Project Name',
     'description': 'Unique identifier for the project, for example: '
                    'organization.product.project',
     'errorMessage': 'Not a valid project name. It must consist of '
                     'lowercase alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, '
                     'and period only. Additionally, it may contain an '
                     'npm-style package scope. For details, see: '
                     'https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/stable/pages/Configuration/#name'}

On instance['metadata']['name']:
    'my ui5 app'

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on oneOf keyword
tests.rust_error: Additional properties are not allowed ('optional' was unexpected)
tests.python_error:
Additional properties are not allowed ('development', 'optional' were unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema['then']['then']['else']['then']['then']['properties']['framework']['properties']['libraries']['items']['then']:
    {'additionalProperties': False,
     'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string'}},
     'errorMessage': 'Either "development" or "optional" can be true, but '
                     'not both'}

On instance['framework']['libraries'][2]:
    {'name': 'sap.ui.custom', 'optional': True, 'development': True}

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on minLength keyword or maxLength keyword
tests.python_error:
'a' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['then']['then']['else']['then']['then']['properties']['metadata']['properties']['name']:
    {'type': 'string',
     'minLength': 3,
     'maxLength': 80,
     'pattern': '^(?:@[0-9a-z-_.]+\\/)?[a-z][0-9a-z-_.]*$',
     'title': 'Project Name',
     'description': 'Unique identifier for the project, for example: '
                    'organization.product.project',
     'errorMessage': 'Not a valid project name. It must consist of '
                     'lowercase alphanumeric characters, dash, underscore, '
                     'and period only. Additionally, it may contain an '
                     'npm-style package scope. For details, see: '
                     'https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/stable/pages/Configuration/#name'}

On instance['metadata']['name']:
    'a'

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on anyOf keyword
tests.rust_error: Additional properties are not allowed ('optional' was unexpected)
tests.python_error:
Additional properties are not allowed ('development', 'optional' were unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema['then']['then']['else']['then']['then']['properties']['framework']['properties']['libraries']['items']['then']:
    {'additionalProperties': False,
     'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string'}},
     'errorMessage': 'Either "development" or "optional" can be true, but '
                     'not both'}

On instance['framework']['libraries'][0]:
    {'name': 'sap.ui.core', 'optional': True, 'development': True}

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on if keyword or then keyword or else keyword
tests.rust_error: Additional properties are not allowed ('optional' was unexpected)
tests.python_error:
Additional properties are not allowed ('anotherPath' was unexpected)

Failed validating 'additionalProperties' in schema['then']['then']['else']['then']['then']['properties']['resources']['properties']['configuration']['properties']['paths']:
    {'type': 'object',
     'additionalProperties': False,
     'properties': {'webapp': {'type': 'string'}}}

On instance['resources']['configuration']['paths']:
